trans-unit.source: Azure Batch development libraries and tools | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: Azure Batch development libraries and tools | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: Get the libraries and tools you need to develop Azure Batch applications
trans-unit.target: Get the libraries and tools you need to develop Azure Batch applications

trans-unit.source: Azure Batch development libraries and tools
trans-unit.target: Azure Batch development libraries and tools

trans-unit.source: Get these libraries and tools to develop Azure Batch applications.
trans-unit.target: Get these libraries and tools to develop Azure Batch applications.

trans-unit.source: Batch
trans-unit.target: Batch

trans-unit.source: [Batch Client Library for .NET](http://www.nuget.org/packages/Azure.Batch/) (NuGet) – Develop client applications to run jobs with the Batch service
trans-unit.target: [Batch Client Library for .NET](http://www.nuget.org/packages/Azure.Batch/) (NuGet) – Develop client applications to run jobs with the Batch service

trans-unit.source: [Batch Management Library](http://www.nuget.org/packages/Microsoft.Azure.Management.Batch/) (NuGet) – Manage Batch accounts
trans-unit.target: [Batch Management Library](http://www.nuget.org/packages/Microsoft.Azure.Management.Batch/) (NuGet) – Manage Batch accounts

trans-unit.source: [Batch Explorer](https://github.com/Azure/azure-batch-samples/tree/master/CSharp/BatchExplorer) (GitHub) - GUI application and sample to browse, access, and update major elements within a Batch account, including jobs and tasks, compute nodes and pools, and files on a compute node.
trans-unit.target: [Batch Explorer](https://github.com/Azure/azure-batch-samples/tree/master/CSharp/BatchExplorer) (GitHub) - GUI application and sample to browse, access, and update major elements within a Batch account, including jobs and tasks, compute nodes and pools, and files on a compute node.

trans-unit.source: See the [blog post](http://blogs.technet.com/b/windowshpc/archive/2015/01/20/azure-batch-explorer-sample-walkthrough.aspx).
trans-unit.target: See the [blog post](http://blogs.technet.com/b/windowshpc/archive/2015/01/20/azure-batch-explorer-sample-walkthrough.aspx).

trans-unit.source: Batch Apps
trans-unit.target: Batch Apps

trans-unit.source: [Batch Apps Cloud SDK](http://www.nuget.org/packages/Microsoft.Azure.Batch.Apps.Cloud/1.1.1-preview) (NuGet) – Enable applications to offload jobs to the Batch service
trans-unit.target: [Batch Apps Cloud SDK](http://www.nuget.org/packages/Microsoft.Azure.Batch.Apps.Cloud/1.1.1-preview) (NuGet) – Enable applications to offload jobs to the Batch service

trans-unit.source: [Batch Apps Visual Studio Extension](https://visualstudiogallery.msdn.microsoft.com/8b294850-a0a5-43b0-acde-57a07f17826a) (Visual Studio Gallery) – Cloud-enable applications in Visual Studio using the Batch Apps Cloud SDK
trans-unit.target: [Batch Apps Visual Studio Extension](https://visualstudiogallery.msdn.microsoft.com/8b294850-a0a5-43b0-acde-57a07f17826a) (Visual Studio Gallery) – Cloud-enable applications in Visual Studio using the Batch Apps Cloud SDK

trans-unit.source: [Batch Apps Client SDK](http://www.nuget.org/packages/Microsoft.Azure.Batch.Apps/2.3.0-preview) (NuGet) – Interact with applications enabled to offload jobs to the Batch service
trans-unit.target: [Batch Apps Client SDK](http://www.nuget.org/packages/Microsoft.Azure.Batch.Apps/2.3.0-preview) (NuGet) – Interact with applications enabled to offload jobs to the Batch service

trans-unit.source: [Batch Apps Python Client](https://github.com/Azure/azure-batch-apps-python) (GitHub) - Python client module to interact with applications set up in a Batch Apps service
trans-unit.target: [Batch Apps Python Client](https://github.com/Azure/azure-batch-apps-python) (GitHub) - Python client module to interact with applications set up in a Batch Apps service

trans-unit.source: [AZURE.IMPORTANT]Azure will only release the Batch Apps API as a Preview.
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.IMPORTANT]Azure will only release the Batch Apps API as a Preview.

trans-unit.source: You should only develop with it for test or proof-of-concept projects.
trans-unit.target: You should only develop with it for test or proof-of-concept projects.

trans-unit.source: Key Batch Apps capabilities will be integrated into the Batch API in future service releases.
trans-unit.target: Key Batch Apps capabilities will be integrated into the Batch API in future service releases.
